member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute
member.summary: Attribute used to indicate a source generator should create a function for marshalling arguments instead of relying on the runtime to generate an equivalent marshalling function at run-time.
member.remarks: This attribute is meaningless if the source generator associated with it is not enabled. The current built-in source generator only supports C# and only supplies an implementation when applied to static, partial, non-generic methods.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the .
member.param: Name of the library containing the import.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.LibraryName
member.summary: Gets the name of the library containing the import.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.EntryPoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the entry point to be called.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.StringMarshalling
member.summary: Gets or sets how to marshal string arguments to the method.
member.remarks: If this field is set to a value other than , must not be specified.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.StringMarshallingCustomType
member.summary: Gets or sets the used to control how string arguments to the method are marshalled.
member.remarks: If this field is specified, must not be specified or must be set to .

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.SetLastError
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the callee sets an error (SetLastError on Windows or errno on other platforms) before returning from the attributed method.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StringMarshalling
member.summary: Specifies how strings should be marshalled for generated p/invokes

member.name: F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StringMarshalling.Custom
member.summary: Indicates the user is suppling a specific marshaller in .

member.name: F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StringMarshalling.Utf8
member.summary: Use the platform-provided UTF-8 marshaller.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StringMarshalling.Utf16
member.summary: Use the platform-provided UTF-16 marshaller.

member.name: P:System.SR.TimeSpan_invalid_format
member.summary: Invalid configuration: {0}="{1}". The {0} value must be a time interval that can be parsed by System.TimeSpan.Parse.

member.name: P:System.SR.Value_must_be_non_negative_integer
member.summary: Invalid configuration: {0}="{1}". The {0} value must be a non-negative 32-bit integer.

member.name: P:System.SR.Value_must_be_positive_integer
member.summary: Invalid configuration: {0}="{1}". The {0} value must be a positive 32-bit integer.

member.name: P:System.SR.Value_too_big
member.summary: Invalid configuration: {0}="{1}". The {0} value cannot be greater than '{2}'.

member.name: P:System.SR.Empty_collection
member.summary: The collection '{0}' is empty.

member.name: P:System.SR.Collection_contains_null_element
member.summary: The collection '{0}' contains a null element.

member.name: P:System.SR.Collection_contains_null_or_empty_string
member.summary: The collection '{0}' contains a null or empty string.

member.name: P:System.SR.Method_already_invoked
member.summary: The method has already been invoked, and can only be invoked once.

member.name: P:System.SR.Property_already_set
member.summary: The property has already been set, and can only be set once.

member.name: P:System.SR.Invalid_state
member.summary: Invalid state.

member.name: P:System.SR.Init_not_complete
member.summary: Initialization has not completed yet. The InitializationComplete method must be invoked before Dispose is invoked.

member.name: P:System.SR.Default_is_reserved
member.summary: Default is a reserved MemoryCache name.

member.name: P:System.SR.Invalid_expiration_combination
member.summary: AbsoluteExpiration must be DateTimeOffset.MaxValue or SlidingExpiration must be TimeSpan.Zero.

member.name: P:System.SR.Invalid_callback_combination
member.summary: Only one callback can be specified. Either RemovedCallback or UpdateCallback must be null.

member.name: P:System.SR.Invalid_argument_combination
member.summary: One of the following parameters must be specified: dependencies, absoluteExpiration, slidingExpiration.

member.name: P:System.SR.Update_callback_must_be_null
member.summary: CacheItemUpdateCallback must be null.

member.name: P:System.SR.Argument_out_of_range
member.summary: '{0}' must be greater than or equal to '{1}' and less than or equal to '{2}'.

member.name: P:System.SR.Empty_string_invalid
member.summary: An empty string is invalid.

member.name: P:System.SR.RegionName_not_supported
member.summary: The parameter regionName must be null.

member.name: P:System.SR.Value_must_be_boolean
member.summary: Invalid configuration: {0}="{1}". The {0} value must be a boolean.

member.name: P:System.SR.PlatformNotSupported_Caching
member.summary: System.Runtime.Caching is not supported on this platform.

member.name: P:System.SR.PlatformNotSupported_PhysicalMemoryLimitPercentage
member.summary: The PhysicalMemoryLimitPercentage parameter is not supported on this platform.

member.name: T:Interop.BOOL
member.summary: Blittable version of Windows BOOL type. It is convenient in situations where manual marshalling is required, or to avoid overhead of regular bool marshalling.
member.remarks: Some Windows APIs return arbitrary integer values although the return type is defined as BOOL. It is best to never compare BOOL to TRUE. Always use bResult != BOOL.FALSE or bResult == BOOL.FALSE .
